verses.verse: A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> The <S%H776>earth<s%> is the <S%H3068>LORD's,<s%> and the <S%H4393>fullness<s%> thereof; the <S%H8398>world,<s%> and they that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein.
For he has <S%H3245>founded<s%> it on the <S%H3220>seas,<s%> and <S%H3559>established<s%> it on the <S%H5104>floods.<s%>
<S%H4310>Who<s%> shall <S%H5927>ascend<s%> into the <S%H2022>hill<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD?<s%> or <S%H4310>who<s%> shall <S%H6965>stand<s%> in his <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place?<s%>

He that has <S%H5355>clean<s%> <S%H3709>hands,<s%> and a <S%H1249>pure<s%> <S%H3824>heart;<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> has not <S%H5375>lifted<s%> up his <S%H5315>soul<s%> to <S%H7723>vanity,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H7650>sworn<s%> <S%H4820>deceitfully.<s%>
He shall <S%H5375>receive<s%> the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> from the <S%H430>God<s%> of his <S%H3468>salvation.<s%>
<S%H2088>This<s%> is the <S%H1755>generation<s%> of them that <S%H1875>seek<s%> him, that <S%H1245>seek<s%> your <S%H6440>face,<s%> O <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>

<S%H5375>Lift<s%> up your <S%H7218>heads,<s%> O you <S%H8179>gates;<s%> and be you <S%H5375>lift<s%> up, you <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H6607>doors;<s%> and the <S%H4428>King<s%> of <S%H3519>glory<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> in.

<S%H4310>Who<s%> is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4428>King<s%> of <S%H3519>glory?<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5808>strong<s%> and <S%H1368>mighty,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1368>mighty<s%> in <S%H4421>battle.<s%>

<S%H5375>Lift<s%> up your <S%H7218>heads,<s%> O you <S%H8179>gates;<s%> even <S%H5375>lift<s%> them up, you <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H6607>doors;<s%> and the <S%H4428>King<s%> of <S%H3519>glory<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> in.
<S%H4310>Who<s%> is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4428>King<s%> of <S%H3519>glory?<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> he is the <S%H4428>King<s%> of <S%H3519>glory.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
